entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make RateLimiters disposable #38308
  • Blazor can't use EventCallback with array TypeParam value #38307
  • Redesign the current aspnetcore Concurrency limiter middleware to use the new abstractions & implementations #38306
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor.defaultReconnectionHandler._reconnectCallback undefined #38305
  • Startup regression: json #38304
  • ASP.NET Core SignalR - SkipNegotiation by default and use Negotiation if WebSocket connection fails. #38300
  • Input elements not generating scope identifier from CSS isolation #38299
  • error trying to run dotnet watch #38303
  • IIS dont Run my App in Asp.NetCore 2.2 Helpme Please #38298
  • Access token exhaustion when using client credentials flow #38297
    Discussions
  • StaticFileMiddleware serve pre-compressed file when found by file provider #38295
  • Blazor: File referenced in nuget .props file but the file itself is not in the nuget package #38294
  • Conflicting assets with the same target path after upgrading Blazor from .net 5 to .net 6 #38292
  • InputBase does not update FieldIdentifier when a new ValueExpression is set #38288
  • @microsoft/signalr V6.0.0 is not working on react-native apps #38286
  • Startup improvement: fortunes #38285
  • BUG: Reopen #38192 #38282
  • Moving BlazorDesktop WinForm by dragging element in BlazorWebView crashes #38277
  • Why is aspnetcore looking for deps.json in production env? #38275

Closed

  • Publish Blazor WebAssembly from Visual Studio with Web Deploy to Azure AppService results in lots of errors: Failed to find a valid digest in the 'integrity' attribute for resource #38289
  • Perf regression: mvc #38284
  • Perf improvement: endpoint #38283
  • `dotnet watch` (hot reload) does not set property `DotNetWatchBuild` or `DOTNET_WATCH` #38296
  • Blazor WASM hosted on IIS 10 log in exception for some users. #23215
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor Hot Reload only Works with dotnet watch, not from Visual Studio 2022 #38202
  • ModelState cannot be added to TempData (cannot be serialized) #4816
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Inconsistent HTML Encoding of Validation Message #4830
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Textarea tagHelper is not rendering the contents of the element correctly. #4852
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Stop setting name attribute in DefaultHtmlGenerator.GenerateHiddenForCheckbox #4942
    .NET 7 Planning
  • TempData entry is not deleted when redirecting #26798
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor WASM : .NET 5 RC2 : Looking for non referenced native DLLs. Resource has been Blocked #27097
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Remove third-party dependencies from templates #27337
    .NET 7 Planning
  • setting LowercaseQueryStrings = false not working as expected. #32533
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor WASM site flagged as malicious by Google Ads #37388
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Is there a way to access `window` object in the Browser from Blazor Webassembly? #37790
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor wasm auth diagnostics #38123
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor server connection reliability improvements #38124
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Template/MVC tests fail after updating TFM to net7.0 #36765
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Code used in .NetConf Day 1 #38253
  • Add support for CSS isolation in MVC tag helpers #38265
  • .NET inside browsers #38278
  • ASP.Net 6 custom WebApplicationFactory throws exception #38248
  • Build From Source inconsistencies #38181
  • The group can be removed if there is none in the group in signalr? #38200

PullRequests

Created

  • Resolve Component Governance bugs #38310
  • Enable trimming for some libraries #38302
  • [SPA] Fix whitespace issues with the SpaProxy bash script #38293
    area-runtime, 6.0.x

Merged

  • [main] Mark 6.0 API surface as shipped #38281
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] Update to latest #38280
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Avoid null ref in TagHelperMatchingConvention when attribute name is null #38271
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 6.0.1
  • Enable TrackLinkedCacheEntries for cache tag helpers #38190
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Update to latest #38231
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0] Let VS update our solution #38279
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.1
  • Fix Visual Studio 2019 components configuration file #38182
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix EmptyBodyBehavior with empty content-type #38092
    area-mvc, feature-Model-Binding
  • Add attributes to SignalR source generator #38025
    area-signalr, api-suggestion
  • Support binding to form and form file parameters in minimal actions #35158
    api-suggestion, community-contribution, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • TESTING AUTOMATION. THIS WON'T BE MERGE #38272
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
